Question: A large water tank with a volume of \(3286\) liters initially contains pure water. Then, a solution containing \(0.35\%\) ink by volume starts flowing into the tank at a rate of \(4\) liters per minute. The mixture in the tank is kept uniform by stirring and flows out at the same rate to maintain constant volume. What will be the concentration of ink in percent by volume after \(55\) minutes? Please provide your answer to two significant figures.
